My Tools That I Created

Text Fragment URL

A tool that uses the new text fragment API to save a URL with a specific scroll position based on highlighting text.

Website Repo

Youtube Download Trimmer

A tool that downloads a youtube video and lets you trim it and download the video slices you want.

Website Repo

Deep work dashboard

A tool for tracking deep work sessions. It has a pomodoro timer and binaural beats

Website Repo

Music Practice Dashboard

A collection of several IFrames plus a custom PIP practice timer that makes this site every musician's best friend for starting a practice session. It has a metronome, a timer, and a PIP practice timer.

Website Repo

Picture in Picture Audio Player

A tool that renders a PIP audio player that loads any audio, either from a URL or from a file. Perfect for listening to music or a podcast while working on something else.

Website Repo

Upload image from clipboard

A tool to upload an image copied to your clipboard to a server and gets back a permanent URL That you can reference again and again.

Website Repo

Ultimate Web Block Chrome Extension

A free web block chrome extension that blocks any website you want for a specific time. It has a custom block list, blocking in incognito, and creating focus groups.

Extension Repo

Youtube Bookmarker

The best chrome extension to save timestamps and notes on your favorite youtube videos

Extension Repo

Color Picker Extension

A simple color picker extension that just plains work without invasive content scripts

Extension Repo

Assorted Vanilla JS

A collection of vanilla typescript classes that make JavaScript APIs even simpler. There are classes to resize images and to record audio

Website Repo

Link Shortener

A Deno server using native OAuth and Deno KV Database to use. It takes a link, shortens it to a permanent URL you can share easily with anybody.

Website Repo

Three JS Notes

All my notes I've ever learned. JavaScript, Git, Bash Scripting. Consume all my knowledge.

Website Repo
